page.title: 20WHY STOP THE HIPPIES?
page.content: THE HIPPIES ARE THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE WHO GO TO STONEHENGE EVERY YEAR FOR THE SUMMER SOLSTICE ON JUNE 21ST, WHICH IS WHEN THE SUN SHINES THROUGH TWO GREAT STONES.FOR THE PAST ELEVEN YEARS THEY HAVE BEEN ALLLOWED TO GO TO THE FAMOUS MONUMENT,BUT NOW, THIS YEAR, 1985 THE POLICE ARE STOPPING THEM BECAUSE THE PEOPLE IN CHARGE DON'T WANT THE COUNTRYSIDE OR STONES RUINED,BUT MAINLY DON'T WANT THE ABUSE OF DRUGS.THE HIPPIES ARE SWARMING AROUND AMESBURY AND LARKHILL,NEARBY TOWNS.POLICE HAVE SET UP ROADBLOCKS ON ROADS LEADING TO STONEHENGE BUT TOUR- ISTS CAN VISIT.HIPPIES ARE CAMPING ON LORD CARDIGAN'S LAND,HE WAS HORRIFIED AT ACTION TO REMOVE THEM.PERHAPS THEY WILL BE ABLE TO VISIT AFTER ALL;I DON'T THINK THE POLICE HAVE THE RIGHT TO STOP THEM,WHATEVER THE REASON.
